amendment.description: To strike the title relating to energy emergencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2651 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2651 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2650. (consideration: CR S10980-10981; text: CR S10980) To strike the title relating to energy emergencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2651 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2651 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2650.
